Author: traumabroccoli
Text: Portion sizes are weird because it kind of assumes you’re having a balanced meal when most meals aren’t inherently balanced.  I feel like portions are built around the traditional Sunday Roast (meat, potatoes, veg) but that’s probably the only normal meal that is segmented in such a way.   Completely leaves out cultural differences in eating habits and I think portion sizes for the most part are stupid, but I guess it’s more ‘healthy’ than teaching kids CICO or whatever

Author: TheOrangeOcelot
Text: I mean... clearly a lot of people can't/don't given the obesity epidemic. I know I'm an all (aka, too much) or nothing person... I never figured it out.
